mapper.insert: insert into device(d_name, d_price, d_number, d_dateForP, d_manufacturer, d_shelfLife, d_adminID, d_facultyID, d_isBorrowed) values (#{d_name}, #{d_price}, #{d_number}, #{d_dateForP}, #{d_manufacturer}, #{d_shelfLife}, #{d_adminID}, #{d_facultyID}, #{d_isBorrowed})
mapper.update: update device set d_name=#{d_name}, d_price=#{d_price}, d_number=#{d_number}, d_dateForP=#{d_dateForP}, d_manufacturer=#{d_manufacturer}, d_shelfLife=#{d_shelfLife}, d_adminID=#{d_adminID}, d_facultyID=#{d_facultyID}, d_isBorrowed=#{d_isBorrowed} where d_ID = #{d_ID}
